item.title: GigaMAN and Gigabit Ethernet Services
item.description: Organizations in need of truly fast wide area network connections should consider gigabit Ethernet services like GigaMAN. These high-bandwidth circuits are now more affordable than ever. Ethernet WAN services are a newer option for businesses and organizations, offering end-to-end Ethernet protocol signal maintenance. This eliminates the need for protocol conversion between a company’s LAN and traditional TDM telco circuits. Ethernet speeds range from 10 Mbps (standard) to 100 Mbps (Fast Ethernet) and 1000 Mbps (Gigabit Ethernet).
